properties.entry: SELECT [LIV_ID] AS ID,[LIV_NM_TITULO] AS TITULO,[LIV_NM_AUTOR] AS AUTOR,[LIV_SC_AREA] AS AREA,[LIV_NU_ANO] AS ANO,[LIV_DS_RESUMO] AS RESUMO,[LIV_NM_ISBN] AS ISBN FROM [biblioteca].[dbo].[LIV_LIVRO] WHERE LIV_NM_ISBN = ?

SELECT [LIV_ID] AS ID,[LIV_NM_TITULO] AS TITULO,[LIV_NM_AUTOR] AS AUTOR,[LIV_SC_AREA] AS AREA,[LIV_NU_ANO] AS ANO,[LIV_DS_RESUMO] AS RESUMO,[LIV_NM_ISBN] AS ISBN FROM [biblioteca].[dbo].[LIV_LIVRO] WHERE LIV_ID = ?
